TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. The person, however, interprets that wrongly, and warm, fuzzy, mutual love happens.

I wish for the removal of kebabs.

Granted. Delicious meatses are wasted instead of used in kebabs.

I wish for anti-warhead slime.

Granted. the slime eats the war head and it eats you and it eats that purple thing.

I wish to defend kebab

granted, but then he kills you

i wish for a Kerbal X

A Kerbal X-tra boring.

I wish for a perfect cookie that can't be corrupted.

Granted, it's OATMEAL RAISINS.

I wish for a calculator

granted, but its melting in lava.

i wish for a f-16

granted, but its melting in lava.

i wish for a f-16

Granted, but it has a bomb inside that will explode but you never know when.

I wish for eternal happiness.

granted. you are happy, but everyone else is depressed.

i wish for proper grammar

granted. you are happy, but everyone else is depressed.

i wish for proper grammar

Granted, but it's in Hungarian.

I wish for a million steaks.

granted, but they are steaks from your best friend.

I wish for infinite chocolate fudge poptarts.

QUOTE=xXIndestructibleEVAXx;2067377]granted, but they are steaks from your best friend.

I wish for infinite chocolate fudge poptarts.[ QUOTE] Sure, but they are expired, stale, and taste like Pineapples.

I wish for Apple to not copy-and-paste phone designs.

Granted, but their brand-new sparkly designs become so popular with females aged 12-36 that they all explode with glee, causing an entire generation to go *poof* thus dooming mankind.

I wish I had white rep

Granted, but their brand-new sparkly designs become so popular with females aged 12-36 that they all explode with glee, causing an entire generation to go *poof* thus dooming mankind.

I wish I had white rep

Granted, but it stays white forever and not even the best mods can bring back the green.

I wish NASA actually got funded.

Granted, they can finally begin summoning Cthulhu.

I wish for something purple.

Granted, you summoned barney. You get to be on their show forever.

I wish for infinite wishes.

Granted, but they're all corrupted.

I wish I could stop collapsing black holes.

Granted. You use yourself.

I wish I could comprehend the sheer scale of the Yottajoule. It's so huge!

Granted. Your brain explodes because of all the information

I wish i could fly

Granted. You can't land.

I wish for ComicCon 2016 to be in Germany. :-D

Granted, a huge storm forms and electricity goes out.

I wish for every game on steam

Granted, a huge storm forms and electricity goes out.

I wish for every game on steam

Granted, but they all turn into copies of Grass Simulator

I wish for a free trip to Mars.

Granted, but you cant get back.

I wish to be able to run 20 mph without tiring.

Granted! NO BRAKES (or any other ability to stop).

A pure and simple wish I make: for a remake of Mechwarrior 2: Mercenaries for me to play.

Granted, the game crashes every time you try to play it.

I wish to be able to not have to eat or drink for the rest of my life.
